nodes.text: Ardia Terrsyn a female Human who worked as an actress around the time of the Clone Wars and the formation of the Galactic Empire. She acquired a taste for sabacc, after playing it while researching a role in a holodrama about a Hutt criminal family. In 17 BBY, she later traveled to Alderaan, to attend the launch of the luxury repulsortrain Gem of Alderaan.
